commits.message:
Merge pull request #636 from cygaar/fix_build

fix: node package builds

pull_requests.title: refactor: update `package.json` and `turbo.json` for improved build and development scripts

pr_comments.body:
> this is WIP for now

great! can you mark it as a `Draft PR` until ready? Thanks!
I will give this a check in a bit, thanks!!
Sorry, I didn't see your PR. This has just been fixed by #636. I'll adjust my check flow to reward early contributions from now on; my bad
Does it make sense to pump the versions in the `package.json` definitions directly to `"version": "0.1.4-alpha.4",` instead of `alpha.3`?
found smth that needs another fix, mb

weird, it works when running multiple time but breaks at the first time.
maybe @lalalune or @cygaar can take over, as I cant finish this today

> Hi @fabianhug, the behaviour of turborepo has been really weird just as you've observed and stated above. The build config and script works as I have previously done. I also have a workaround for the dev script in #793

perfect - but thanks for frontrunning my contribution, haha! great it works now, nw

> > > Hi @fabianhug, the behaviour of turborepo has been really weird just as you've observed and stated above. The build config and script works as I have previously done. I also have a workaround for the dev script in #793
> > 
> > 
> > perfect - but thanks for frontrunning my contribution, haha! great it works now, nw

> hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha

love u bae, closing now

contribution_summary: The user is currently working on fixing node package builds and updating `package.json` and `turbo.json` for improved build and development scripts.
